items.text: Do any of these apply to you?
Did you have a crush injury?
items.contextHelp: A crush injury occurs when force or pressure is put on a body part. This type of injury most often happens when part of the body is squeezed between two heavy objects.

items.text: Have you fallen from a significant height?
Where you hit by a moving vehicle?
Where you hit by a high velocity material/object?
items.contextHelp: Debris from an explosion, rubber bullets are high velocity.
